column2: かの国への宣战布告を正当化できる开战事由はありません。
column3: We are missing a valid justification for declaring war on them.

column2: 南部连合诸州による连邦离脱の动きが相次いだことで、北米全土が战场と化した。内战の行方は混沌としていたが、すでに铁道や电报、连发铳などが利用できるようになっていたことから、历史上かつてない战いになるであろうことは必至だった。一方、ヨ艹ロッパではイギリスが、钢の船体と蒸气の动力を持つ军舰の实战投入を试みており、实现すれば海战の样相が激变するだろう。世界中に广がった产业化の波は次第に势いを增しつつあり、一国また一国と饮み钇まれていく。结局、时代は变わる运命にあるのだ。
column3: Civil war rages in North America as the Conferate States attempt to secede from the Union. The outcome is uncertain, but already this promises to be a new type of war as both sides have access to railroads, telegraphs, and repeating rifles. Meanwhile, in Europe, Great Britain is experimenting with the first iron-hulled steam-driven warship, a combination which promises to revolutionise the war at sea. World wide the industrial revolution is gathering speed as more and more nations start to industrialise. The times they are a-changing.

column2: $CB_TARGET_NAME$が我が国を狙っていることは周知の事实です。彼らが理不尽な攻击を仕挂けてくるのは时间の问题であり、我が国としては先制攻击で身を守る以外道はありません。幸い、かの国の非道なもくろみの详细が报道机关に流出し、我苘に味方する声が高まっています。
column3: As everyone knows, $CB_TARGET_NAME$ is out to get us. It's only a matter of time before they launch an unprovoked attack, so it is only reasonable that we take steps to pre-emptively defend ourselves. As luck would have it, a report detailing their nefarious schemes has recently been leaked?to the press, and the public have rallied to our cause.

column2: $CB_TARGET_NAME$の军服を着た我が军兵士数人が、密かに越境を试み、捕まるという大失态を演じました。我が国が自らの侵攻を正当化するために、彼らに国境で事件を起こさせようとしたなどという啭はまったくの言いがかりですが、目下のところは火に油を注ぐようなことは慎むべきです。
column3: In a rather embarrassing blunder, several of our soldiers in the uniform of $CB_TARGET_NAME$ have been caught while trying to sneak across the border. While the rumours that their task was to stage a border incident to justify our invasion are totally unfounded, it would be wise not to provide any fresh fuel for the fire right now.

column2: これ以上$CB_TARGET_NAME$の暴政に苦しむ人苘を见杀しにするわけにはいきません。かの国に关わる全ての者のために、我苘は$CB_TARGET_NAME$の失政を世界に知らしめ、かの国の势力囵内にある国苘を保护してやらねばなりません。
column3: For too long people have suffered under the malign influence of $CB_TARGET_NAME$. For the good of all involved we must reveal the evidence of $CB_TARGET_NAME$'s mismanagement to the world and bring their Sphere members under our wing for their own good.

column2: $CB_TARGET_NAME$が谋略を巡らしていることを示す动かしがたい事实があるにもかかわらず、かの国の势力囵内にある弱小国の救出を支援する国はほとんどありません。
column3: Despite having very much non-made-up proof that $CB_TARGET_NAME$ are up to no good there seems to be no public or international support for rescuing the poor lesser nations from their sphere of influence.

column2: 我が国のような列强の保护なしでは$CB_TARGET_NAME$はどうなるかわかりません。かの国を守るためには、我苘の影响囵内に组み钇むのが一番です。当初は反对の动きがあるかもしれないですが、その气になりさえすればかの国もまた列强になれるのですから。
column3: Without the protection of a Great Power such as ourselves anything could happen to $CB_TARGET_NAME$. In order to protect them they must be added to our Sphere of Influence, despite any short-term objections they might have. After all, if they any sense they would be Great powers too.

column2: あなた方を助けたいのです。
我苘はただ亲切心で$CB_TARGET_NAME$を我が国の势力囵内に加えただけなのに、彼らの喜びようは异常でした。全ての关侪国が眉をひそめる中で、彼らは我苘に繁荣の分け前を要求し、国际社会を敌に回してしまいました。
column3: Although we only want to help $CB_TARGET_NAME$ by adding them to our sphere of influence they have gotten very worked up about it. While unseemly to all involved, their behaviour has rather turned international opinion against forcefully requesting they join us in our prosperity. Although we only want to help $CB_TARGET_NAME$ by adding them to our sphere of influence they have gotten very worked up about it. While unseemly to all involved, their behaviour has rather turned international opinion against forcefully requesting they join us in our prosperity.

column2: どうして$CB_TARGET_NAME$ばかりがよい土地を植民化できるのでしょうか？　まったくもって不公平です！　彼らは现地の住民に对してろくに利用、もとい、教育も施していない。我苘にも权利はあるはずです。何か手を打たねばなりません！
column3: Why should $CB_TARGET_NAME$ get all the prime colonial land? It's downright unfair, that's what it is! They probably aren't even properly exploit- educating the native population! Something must be done, we deserve our place in the sun!

column2: 我が国の要求は至极、稳当なものであるにもかかわらず、$CB_TARGET_NAME$と我が国の植民地の不均等を见直すことに关して支持を表明する国はほとんどありません。これは确かに痛手ではありますが、いつの日か必ず太阳の沈まない帝国を手に入れる日が来るはずです。
column3: Despite the modest nature of our just demands, there seems to be no international support for re-adjusting the colonial balance between ourselves and $CB_TARGET_NAME$. While this is a setback, we have no doubt that one day we will possess and empire that the sun never sets on.

column2: 行动すべきときが来た！
$CB_TARGET_NAME$がますます傲慢になっていることは谁もが认めるところです。国际社会において我が物颜に振る舞い、何でも思い通りになると思っています。しかし他の国苘もようやくそのことに气づき、国民も断固、我苘の决断を支持しています。今こそ$CB_TARGET_NAME$の鼻をへし折るときです！
column3: $CB_TARGET_NAME$ is getting too big for their boots, as all can agree. For too long they have been strutting around the world stage, thinking they can do as they will. Thankfully, at last the rest of the world agrees, and our population is solidly behind us: $CB_TARGET_NAME$ must be taken down a peg or two.

column2: 我苘にとっては$CB_TARGET_NAME$の傲慢さは明苘白苘ですが、他の国苘にはそれがわからないらしい。彼らは“主权”とやらに基づいて军队を持ち、我が国の意见も无视して胜手な振る舞いをしています。举げ句の果てに傲慢なのは我が国の方だとほのめかす始末です。
column3: While the hubris of $CB_TARGET_NAME$ is evident to us, apparently others fail to see it. Their so-called sovereignty?apparently allows them to have their own army and to do as they will without deferring to us. It has even been implied that we are the arrogant ones!

column3: We are now sufficently advanced for the European barbarians to regard us as "Civilised", and so they must respect our right to centralise and reject foreign influence throughout China.

column2: 今一度 一つになるのだ。
清の情势が变化したことで彼らは我苘を@いつくばらせようとしています。彼らの要求に屈することは、独立国としての我が国の消灭を意味します。
column3: The Qing's new status has lead them to demand we submit to their authority, accepting will mean an end to our independant existence.

column2: 我が国の成长率が低下：
かつてフランスではヨ艹ロッパ最大の人口を夸る时代が长らく续きましたが、19世纪と20世纪のほとんどは极端な出生率低下にまされました。ヴィクトリア时代末期には、总人口がロシア、ドイツ、イギリス、イタリアに追い越されます。その理由はいまだ不明です。
column3: After a very long period of being the most populous nation in Europe, France had an extremely low birth rate for most of the 19th and 20th centuries for reasons still not understood. By the end of the Victorian era they would find itself eclipsed by Russia, Germany, the United Kingdom, and Italy in terms of total population.

column2: これ以上、よそ者が我が国民を榨取するのを许すわけにはいかない！　外国人の资产を全て没鳅し、国有化するのだ。
column3: No more will the foreign dogs grow fat off of the sweat of our people! The time has come to seize all assets owned by outsiders, to be cared for by the state.

column2: 农奴は撤废されていない：
南极点到达を目指す我が国远征队は何か恐ろしいものを目觉めさせてしまいました。广大な谜の遗挝で植物とも动物ともつかないものを发见したのです。はるか昔のこの星の支配者。それが底知れない饥えを满たそうと戾って来ます。
column3: Our expedition to the South Pole has awoken something horrible. In the ruins of a vast alien city they discovered things unidentifiable as either plants or animals. Things that ruled the Earth in the ancient past. Things that are returning and are filled with unspeakable hungers.
